attributes.action: Make all electric car charging points universal
attributes.additional_details: All electric car charging areas are too few in number for the volume of cars and 50% are out of order. There is not enough infrastructure
attributes.background: Have a universal electric car charging system in the UK

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for operators.

We could accept a petition calling for the Government to find a national universal charger network, but that wouldn't include all existing chargers.
